price: Zašto da ne obožavam Onoga Koji me je stvorio, a Njemu ćete se vratiti?
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā liya lā aʿbudu alladhī faṭaranī wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
